content: The first section of the report outlines the FY2015 legislative branch appropriations process, including the initial request submission, hearings by House and Senate subcommittees, markups by House Subcommittee on Legislative Branch and House Committee on Appropriations, passage of H.R. 4487 by the House, markup and reporting of H.R. 4487 by the Senate Appropriations Committee, and enactment of continuing appropriations resolutions (P.L. 113-164). The FY2015 legislative branch appropriations process included the enactment of various funding resolutions and the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015.
